A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson has RUINED Star Wars. There were a few great scenes but over all this is by far the WORST Star Wars movie. Episode VII was great and I was excited to see VIII. After watching this piece of garbage I have zero care to watch IX. It’s like he took everything great from the first 7 and flushed it out the airlock. The treatment of just about every major character is either full of flaws and holes or filled with epic disappointment. It almost feels like Rian Johnson has secretly hated Star Wars his whole life and was able to destroy the Star Wars universe in one movie with the justification that change is needed for Star Wars to grow. Hate to inform you buddy... the franchise is bigger than your pathetic vision. I will not waste my money at the movie theater on any further Rian Johnson #@$shows.
